name: Hopebringers
description:
Hopebringers is a Tactical RPG with no randomness and Tabletop RPG flavour. You will take control of the Hopebringers and fight monsters in different dioramas to save the world

FEATURES

  • No randomness
  • Easy to learn gameplay
  • Tabletop RPG inspired art
  • 23 diorama-like levels and 3 procedural levels
  • 8 different characters that you can specialize
